column4: My Desktop folder says 2.7GB free while GParted says 6.3GB Free how much exactly is the free space?
gparted says 6.3GB free for what partition?
if your '/' and your '/home' folders are on different partitions, then the free space will be different
ActionParsnip: sorry for not getting back to you earlier.. whats df -h ? gparted says 6.3 GB free for my main disk (disk of my concern)
